faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about the CyberEco platform

general.title: General Questions
general.a1: CyberEco is a human-centered digital ecosystem for conscious, connected, and sustainable living. We provide a suite of applications that help you manage finances, engage with communities, and connect with others in meaningful ways.
general.a2: Yes! Core features of all CyberEco applications are free to use. We believe in providing accessible tools for everyone. Premium features may be available in the future to support platform development.
general.q3: How does CyberEco protect my privacy?
general.a3: Privacy is fundamental to CyberEco. We use end-to-end encryption, give you complete control over your data, and never sell your information to third parties. You can export or delete your data at any time.
general.a4: Currently available: CyberEco Hub (authentication & identity), JustSplit (expense sharing), and the CyberEco Website. Coming soon: Somos (family roots), Demos (community governance), and Plantopia (smart gardening).

technical.title: Technical Questions
technical.a1: CyberEco works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. For the best experience, we recommend using the latest version of your preferred browser.
technical.a2: Our applications are built as Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) that work great on mobile devices. Native iOS and Android apps are planned for future releases.
technical.a3: Yes! Many features work offline. Your data is stored locally and syncs when you reconnect to the internet. Some features like real-time collaboration require an internet connection.
technical.q4: How do I export my data?
technical.a4: Go to Settings > Privacy > Data Export in any CyberEco application. You can download all your data in standard formats (JSON, CSV) for use in other applications or for backup purposes.

security.title: Security Questions
security.a1: Very secure. We use industry-standard encryption, secure authentication, and regular security audits. Your sensitive data is encrypted before it leaves your device.
security.q2: What if I forget my password?
security.a2: You can reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' link on the sign-in page. We'll send a secure reset link to your registered email address.
security.a3: Yes! We strongly recommend enabling 2FA for added security. We support authenticator apps, SMS codes, and hardware security keys.
security.q4: What happens to my data if I delete my account?
security.a4: When you delete your account, all your personal data is permanently removed from our servers within 30 days. Some anonymized usage data may be retained for improving our services.

justsplit.title: JustSplit Questions
justsplit.a1: Create a group, add expenses, and JustSplit automatically calculates who owes what. You can split equally, by percentage, by shares, or custom amounts.
justsplit.a2: JustSplit supports 150+ currencies with real-time exchange rates. You can add expenses in any currency and view balances in your preferred currency.
justsplit.a3: Yes! Use your camera to scan receipts and JustSplit will automatically extract the amount, date, and merchant information.
justsplit.q4: How do I settle up with friends?
justsplit.a4: JustSplit tracks balances but doesn't handle money transfers. Mark payments as settled after transferring money through your preferred payment method (Venmo, PayPal, bank transfer, cash, etc.).
